q: by the data from the three newer large rail metropolitan areas( see the section "Rail and Traffic Congestion" above). Congestion Cost Savings. The conclusion of "Washington's War" was that work-trip travel times are longer and traffic congestion is more intense in the large-rail metropolitan areas than in the 43 metropolitan areas without intense rail systems. The costs of lost time( including longer travel times due to congestion and the excess time of transit travel) are thus higher in large-rail metropolitan areas. Further, these longer travel times retard economic and employment growth and result in higher rates of unemployment for lower-income households.( Emphasis added.) A principal criticism in "Washington's War" was Donald Rumsfeld Ray LaHood 's use of the dated claim of congestion savings attributable to transit in the APTA report, since much newer data were

momentum in emerging businesses such as display advertising and mobile. Page praised Eric Schmidt in the statement, saying he has done an "outstanding job" and calling him a "tremendous leader." There is no other CEO in the world that could have kept such headstrong founders so deeply involved and still run the business so brilliantly, Page said. Eric Schmidt said the change has been under discussion "for a long time" as the company tried to "simplify" its management structure. "By clarifying our individual roles we'll create

business relationships, government outreach and technology thought leadership", according to the official Google blog spot. Mr Eric Schmidt would continue to act as an advisor to Mr Page and co-founder Mr Sergey Brin . Page will take charge of Google's day-to-day operations as Chief Executive Officer starting April 4. Sergey Brin will focus on strategic projects, in particular working on new products, Mr Eric Schmidt said in the blog spot. The management reshuffle has been brought about to "streamline decision making and create clearer lines of responsibility and accountability" at the top of the company, he added
